categories: Moonsoon Oceanweave P6+ City Seat Pack
description:
Commute or tour in the rain, knowing your gear will remain dry. The Monsoon Onceanweave Seat Pack is highly waterproof and spacious, with plenty of reflective elements and a light attachment to ensure you stay visible. Easy on-off hardware is a breeze to use when coming or going.Polyurethane-coated Oceanweave® fabric made with reclaimed fishnets.Hydracore® liner provides IPX5 waterproofness.Internal side stiffeners and foam stabilize load.Rixen & Kaul® attachment system fits 6-7mm seat rails.Roll-top and compression straps keep the load nice and tight.Top bungee storage system provides additional storage.

        Sustainability














                      Recycled content
name: Axiom Moonsoon Oceanweave P6+ City Seat Pack
